mapper.update: UPDATE pc_board SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, div = #{div}, mod_dt = SYSDATE, mod_id = #{modId} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PC_BOARD WHERE SEQ LIKE #{seq} || '%'

SELECT seq, title, contents, read_cnt as readCnt, div, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as regDt, reg_id as regId, TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as modDt, mod_id as modId FROM pc_board WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pc_board ( title, contents, read_cnt, div, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, 0, #{div}, #{regId}, #{modId} )
